mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.yqyid yqyid, t.zwuuid zwuuid, t.zwh zwh, t.qyid qyid, t.czlx czlx, t.czrid czrid, t.czrmc czrmc, TO_CHAR(t.czsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') czsj, TO_CHAR(t.rzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') rzsj, t.ffmc ffmc, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_ZW_LOG t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM CFPA_ZW_LOG t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_LOG(uuid,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,yqyid,zwuuid,zwh,qyid,czlx,czrid,czrmc,czsj,rzsj,ffmc,delete_flag,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{yqyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{rzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ffmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_ZW_LOG t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_LOG(uuid,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,yqyid,zwuuid,zwh,qyid,czlx,czrid,czrmc,czsj,rzsj,ffmc,delete_flag,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.yqyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yqyid,#{item.zwuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwuuid,#{item.zwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwh,#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.czlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czlx,#{item.czrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czrid,#{item.czrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czrmc,#{item.czsj,jdbcType=DATE} czsj,#{item.rzsj,jdbcType=DATE} rzsj,#{item.ffmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ffmc,'N' delete_flag,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), yqyid = VALUES(yqyid), zwuuid = VALUES(zwuuid), zwh = VALUES(zwh), qyid = VALUES(qyid), czlx = VALUES(czlx), czrid = VALUES(czrid), czrmc = VALUES(czrmc), czsj = VALUES(czsj), rzsj = VALUES(rzsj), ffmc = VALUES(ffmc), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_ZW_LOG t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
